name: RELIC: Additional Character Classes
description:
This zine contains an additional 12 character classes for my D&D rules toolkit, RELIC.

8 full classes.

2 species-as-class options for the Elf and Dwarf from RELIC.

2 micro species-as-class options for my recovering 5e players who still want to play Dragonborn and Tieflings.    :)
